text.__SUMMARY__:
Shorea pauciflora (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti or Red Lauan) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia and Singapore. It is threatened by habitat loss.
The specific epithet pauciflora is Latin for 'few-flowered'.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea pauciflora". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33134A9761265. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33134A9761265.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
